features.name: Real-time Attendance Tracking
features.description: Provides single, accurate, real-time view of employee attendance, performance, productivity, cost and compliance
features.technical_details: Real-time data processing and synchronization

features.name: Biometric Authentication
features.description: Multiple biometric options including facial recognition, fingerprint, and RFID for secure time recording
features.technical_details: Supports RFID, fingerprint, and facial recognition technologies

features.name: Facial Recognition with Advanced Features
features.description: Advanced facial recognition with mask detection, temperature detection, and thermal scanning capabilities
features.technical_details: Includes mask detection, temperature detection, and thermal scanning

features.name: Mobile App with Geo-features
features.description: Cloud-based mobile app with geo-tagging, geo-fencing, and live tracking capabilities
features.technical_details: Available on Android and iOS, includes IMEI tagging to prevent proxy attendance

features.name: Automatic Shift Scheduling
features.description: Automated shift scheduling based on employee availability, skill set, and business requirements
features.technical_details: Auto shift scheduling with shift cut-off, shift rotation, and on-call tracking

features.name: Leave Management System
features.description: Comprehensive leave management with policy definition, approval workflows, and real-time tracking
features.technical_details: Define leave and workflow policies for different employee groups

features.name: Overtime Management
features.description: Automated overtime calculation and policy enforcement with real-time monitoring
features.technical_details: Overtime rules specific to individual businesses and locations

features.name: Project-based Time Tracking
features.description: Capture accurate time tracking data against specific clients, projects, and activities
features.technical_details: Time tracking against clients, projects, and activities

features.name: Role-based Dashboards
features.description: Customized dashboards and views based on different organizational roles
features.technical_details: Different dashboard views based on organizational roles

features.name: Approval Workflows
features.description: Configurable workflows for various tasks requiring supervisor approval
features.technical_details: Creation of workflows based on different tasks for easy approval from supervisors

features.name: Employee Self-Service Portal
features.description: Employee portal for viewing attendance, applying for leave, and accessing personal data
features.technical_details: Web-based and mobile access for employee self-service

features.name: Payroll Integration
features.description: Seamless integration with ADP Vista Payroll and other payroll systems
features.technical_details: Integration with ADP Vista Payroll and other leading payroll systems

features.name: Multi-location Management
features.description: Manage workforce across 1,000+ distributed locations from a single platform
features.technical_details: Supports management across 1,000+ locations

features.name: Irregularity Detection
features.description: Automatic detection of attendance irregularities and data cross-referencing
features.technical_details: Automatically detects irregularities and cross-references data

features.name: Customizable Reporting
features.description: Comprehensive reporting with customizable options for various business needs
features.technical_details: Meticulous audits and customizable reports

features.name: Cloud-based Architecture
features.description: Fully cloud-based solution with pay-as-you-go scaling options
features.technical_details: Cloud-based with pay-as-you-go pricing model

features.name: Tablet App for Shared Devices
features.description: Tablet application allowing multiple employees to authenticate using a single device
features.technical_details: Multiple employee authentication on single device with geofencing

features.name: Web Punch
features.description: Web-based attendance marking for office and remote workers
features.technical_details: Web-based punch application with centralized cloud storage

features.name: Employee Communication Features
features.description: Built-in communication tools including HR Q&A, expense management, and surveys
features.technical_details: Feature to ask HR questions, expense management and surveys

features.name: Diverse Workforce Management
features.description: Support for full-time, part-time, contract, gig, and contingent employees
features.technical_details: Tailored tracking for different employee types

features.name: Biometric Device Integration
features.description: Integration with existing biometric devices and support for new device procurement
features.technical_details: Plug-n-play integration with existing biometric systems

features.name: Advanced Security Features
features.description: Multi-layered security including AWS cloud centers, multi-factor authentication, and role-based access
features.technical_details: AWS Cloud data centers, multifactor authentication, role-based access control, secure API integration

features.name: Industry-specific Solutions
features.description: Tailored solutions for manufacturing, healthcare, construction, banking, retail, and other industries
features.technical_details: Customized for Manufacturing, Transport & Logistics, Banking, Healthcare, Professional Services, Construction

features.name: Shift Bidding and Acceptance
features.description: Transparent shift bidding system allowing employees to bid for preferred shifts
features.technical_details: Transparent shift bidding and acceptance system

features.name: Punch Alerts and Notifications
features.description: Automated alerts and notifications for punch reminders and attendance issues
features.technical_details: Punch alerts based on shift timing with mobile notifications

features.name: Front Camera Self-validation
features.description: Mobile app feature using front camera for employee identity validation
features.technical_details: Front camera validation with IMEI tagging to prevent proxy attendance

features.name: Employee Group-based Policies
features.description: Different policies and rules for different employee groups and categories
features.technical_details: Employee group-based policies for tracking different employee types

features.name: Payroll Freeze and LOP Reversal
features.description: Policies for payroll freeze and Loss of Pay (LOP) reversal to improve discipline
features.technical_details: Payroll Freeze and LOP Reversal policies

features.name: Multiple Manager Support
features.description: Support for different managers for day and night shifts
features.technical_details: Multiple manager support for different shifts

features.name: Continuous Presence Limits
features.description: Limit maximum days of continuous presence for compliance and productivity
features.technical_details: Maximum continuous presence day limits

features.name: Employee-to-Store Mapping
features.description: Geofencing-based mapping ensuring employees can only mark attendance at assigned locations
features.technical_details: Employee to store mapping using devices and geo-fencing

features.name: On-call Tracking
features.description: Special tracking for on-call employees and after-hours work
features.technical_details: On-call tracking for work beyond regular shift times

features.name: Shift Cut-off Management
features.description: Automatic identification and separation of prior day night shift and current day shift
features.technical_details: Shift cut-off to identify prior day night shift and current day shift

features.name: Remote Support and Maintenance
features.description: SLA-based remote support with L1, L2, and L3 support levels
features.technical_details: SLA-based low-cost remote support model with L1 HelpDesk, L2/L3 business hours support

features.name: API Integration with Alerts
features.description: Secure API integration with deep visibility and alert notifications
features.technical_details: Secure integration with deep visibility into API calls and alert notifications
